description: Detects suspicious processes based on name and location that access the browser credential stores which can be the sign of credential stealing
author: frack113
false_positives: Legitimate software installed on partitions other than "C:\"
name: Suspicious Access To Browser Credential Files
query: ((((file.path.text:"*\\Appdata\\Local\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WebCache\\WebCacheV01.dat") OR (file.path.text:("*\\cookies.sqlite" OR "*release\\key3.db" OR "*release\\key4.db" OR "*release\\logins.json")) OR (file.path.text:("*\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Default\\Network\\Cookies*" OR "*\\Appdata\\Local\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Default\\Login\ Data*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Local\ State*"))) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:"System" AND process.parent.executable.text:"Idle")) OR (process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*" OR "C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\*" OR "C\:\\WINDOWS\\SysWOW64\\*"))))) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:"C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\*" AND process.executable.text:("*\\MpCopyAccelerator.exe" OR "*\\MsMpEng.exe"))) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\thor64.exe" OR "*\\thor.exe")) OR (process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe"))))
